means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 拉特职业名称，木匠或绰号，瘦子来源于中世纪英语，含义是“薄而窄的木条”(thin narrow strip of wood)

sentence.Network_en: He holds the belief that he is a latter-day prophet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他深信自己是当代先知。

sentence.Network_en: In his latter years religious mania clouded his mind.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚年的时候，对宗教的狂热让他丧失心智。

sentence.Network_en: He tracked down his cousin and uncle. The latter was sick.
sentence.Network_cn: 他追查到了堂弟和叔叔的下落，发现叔叔这时正在病中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... latest a. 最近的，最新的；最晚的 latter n. （两者之中的）后者 laughter n. 笑； 笑声.
高三英语单词列表_百度知道 ... dandelion  n. 蒲公英 latter  adj. （两者中）后者的 in detail 详细地.
《四级词汇词根+联想记忆法(乱序版)》_百度文库 ... personality 人格 latter 后面的 parliament 议会.
UNIT 3. Lesson from Jefferson_旺旺英语教学网 ... hesitate 犹豫，迟疑不决 latter 后面的；后半的 conflict 冲突.

list.abs: 哪里买的到遇见好男孩（latter days）的台版DVD？ 目前没有资料目前没有资料我要评论如果有一天..... 我能瘦的话!!!!  问一首西洋流.
2010年... ... C. differences. exception 例外， the former…..,the latter( 前者….，后者….) C. entire。extensive 广大的，广阔的；.
latosol 砖红壤latter math 再生草lattice defect 点阵缺损
Modernism and latter modernism design first from construction start., 现代主义和后现代主义设计首先从建筑开始.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lætra 'slower', comparative of læt (see late)

entry.def: When two people, things, or groups have just been mentioned, you can refer to the second of them as the latter.

example.ex: He tracked down his cousin and uncle. The latter was sick.
example.tran: 他追查到了堂弟和叔叔的下落，发现叔叔这时正在病中。

entry.tran: （一个时期或事件）后一半的，接近终了的
entry.def: You use latter to describe the later part of a period of time or event.

example.ex: He is getting into the latter years of his career...
example.tran: 他正步入职业生涯的后半程。

example.ex: The latter part of the debate concentrated on abortion.
example.tran: 后半部分的辩论集中在堕胎问题上。

means.word_mean: 1. the second of two or the second mentioned of two;

sentences.sentence: "Tom and Dick were both heroes but only the latter is remembered today"

means.word_mean: 1. referring to the second of two things or persons mentioned (or the last one or ones of several);

auth_sentence.content: The latter two re-edited 'live' by L too.
auth_sentence.res_content: The latter two re-edited 'live' by L too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The latter two re-edited 'live' by L too.

auth_sentence.content: I suppose I could hope for the latter...?
auth_sentence.res_content: I suppose I could hope for the latter...?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I suppose I could hope for the latter...?

auth_sentence.content: The former is belief, the latter is knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The former is belief, the latter is knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The former is belief, the latter is knowledge.

means.word_mean: 后半的, 接近终了的

sentences.en: He'll go to school in the latter part of the year.
This latter point is of great importance.
sentences.cn: 这后一个论点是非常重要的。

jushi.english: He'll go to school in the latter part of the year.
He was happy in the latter years of life.
This latter point is of great importance.
jushi.chinese: 这后一个论点是非常重要的。
